item.description:
Come check out and/or race autocross! If you wish to race, you must register by Friday!!! Register here:
http://www.motorsportreg.com/index.cfm/event/event.advert/uidEvent/BCE3AF9A-AB04-B026-ACE3ECFBC2BA837D

Autocross is a fun way to test the limits of your car (or driving skill) in a safe, controlled environment. All you need is a car, valid drivers license, and some painters tape (I will bring some if you need to borrow it). Autocross events tend to be all day affairs, so bring sunscreen!

Even if you don't race, come check out the event anytime during the day. There is plenty of car eye candy and people are happy to chat it up with other enthusiasts. Picture taking is welcome, but if you want to take pictures near the track, you will need a friend to spot for you.

E-mail me if you have questions!
item.name: Autocross at Devens
